A Rational Approach to an Irrational Market

The FMI strategy is derived from an aggregation of academic finance material regarding market behaviors and knowledge agreed upon by greatest investors of all time.
We apply time-tested principals to realtime stock fundamentals and news information Our goal is to identify cheap stocks before or during a growth catalyst.
If you would like to familiarize yourself with the academic material, feel free to click below
